Experiment Method.Assay Method: siRNA Knockdown and Cell Viability Assay

Material used.Description: siRNA was used to knock down DJ-1 in neuronal cell lines.

Readout description.Result Description: L166P mutant DJ-1 failed to rescue cell death induced by oxidative stress, ER stress, or proteasome inhibition.
Wild-type DJ-1 rescued cell death induced by oxidative stress, ER stress, or proteasome inhibition.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 overexpression was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector overexpression was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability > 80% under stress conditions (custom threshold)

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability < 50% under stress conditions (custom threshold)
